div.p: Protein visualisation options. a Three of the six rotamers of the residue phenylalanine, indicated by colours blue, orange and green. b PDB entry 1REI, ( left) residue Gln90 un-flipped and ( right) flipped. The un-flipped situation shows an energetically unfavourable close contact (in white numbers) between two hydrogens. c Display of electron density for PDB file 2ETE at contour level 2.0
